author: davidb
msg: Added test to check that TCCL is properly set back when the SPI implemetation throws an exception.

author: carlucci
msg: RAVE-478: Portal does not start without pre-population from initial_data.sql - changed PageType to be an Enum instead of an Entity as it represents system data that should not change throughout the application lifecycle.  This change should resolve the issue of Rave not starting without pre-populated data.

author: joes
msg: caution about lazy publish and hybrid sites
